column4: is there a chance to change the whole system language? I mean my kde/gnome is english, but programs like apt are still german, because I installed ubuntu in german
is there a method to change the whole system language?
I want them to be english
I've set that to en_IE@euro because it's English and still has the Euro char ;)
with my GB keyboard, only through combinations.
I'll have to reboot my system, right?
probably easiest, but you could also run /etc/init.d/keymap.sh and /etc/init.d/console-screen.sh
and whatever comes out when you grep -l environment /etc/init.d/*
it's possible that aptitude will still speak German to you.
haven't bothered to find out how to change that.
